name: pindrop
description: PinDrop allows you to securely share files with either devices on your network, or people on the internet. It has no size limit and is completely free to use.
author: zahtec <top10webgo@gmail.com> (https://zahtec.com/)

scripts.dev: nodemon --ignore dist --ext js,ts,css,html --exec 'npm run build && node .'
scripts.build: tsc && postcss src/styles/globals.css -o dist/public/globals.css && node minify.js && copyfiles -f src/public/*.{json,webp,png} dist/public
